mapper.insert: insert into api_info ( name, module, resource, method, invoke_method, description, create_user_id, create_datetime, last_change_user_id, last_change_datetime ) values ( #{name}, #{module}, #{resource}, #{method}, #{invokeMethod}, #{description}, #{createUserId}, #{createDatetime}, #{lastChangeUserId}, #{lastChangeDatetime} )
mapper.update: update api_info set name = #{name}, module = #{module}, resource = #{resource}, method = #{method}, invoke_method = #{invokeMethod}, description = #{description}, last_change_user_id = #{lastChangeUserId}, last_change_datetime = #{lastChangeDatetime} where id = #{id}
